description: The 7th edition of a classic – optimized through the feedback of outdoor enthusiasts like you. Made for year-round hiking, trekking and mountaineering, this versatile vest uses 3-layer GORE-TEX Infinium to provide windproof breathability and a pleasant touch of stretch. Comfortable and reliable, with three zippered pockets to stash your essentials, this tried-and-true vest really is the Ultimate solution.
name: Mammut Ultimate VII SO Vest - Mens
